hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:I twisted the garlands of the Hadis (i.e. animals for sacrifice) of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) with my own hands. Then Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) put them around their necks with his own hands, and sent them with my father (to Mecca). Nothing legal was regarded illegal for Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) till the animals were slaughtered

chapter.eng-name: To depute someone to sacrifice Budn (camels for sacrifice) and to look after them
